name: extrajudicially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without the permission of or without using the official legal system: The charity has highlighted the shocking number of people who have been executed extrajudicially. The region is now under the control of the militia, who are imprisoning government sympathizers extrajudicially.
in a way that is not done in a court of law: After many months, it was finally agreed to settle the dispute extrajudicially. The claim was resolved extrajudicially, so saving everyone a great deal of time.
More examplesFewer examplesThe vigilantes have been extrajudicially beating up members of a local gang. The confession that he made extrajudicially cannot be used as evidence.
